name: santa-as-a-service
description: Santa on demand - just what you've always wanted for christmas

scripts.package: unzip dependencies.zip && zip -r action.zip * -x ".env" -x "dependencies.zip" -x ".git" -x "test/*" -x "invoke.js" -x "-x "params.json"" && rm -rf node_modules/

author: Sean M. Tracey
